item.title: Home

Home

,

Creek General Transport is one of the first & leading Transport Company in UAE Sharjah established in 1977 and has been a major player in the Road Transport Industry.

,

The Companyâ€™s core business activity is the transportation of bulk Petro chemical Industrial Chemical, Lubricants products, Chemicals, General Cargo movements from various ports in UAE and other packed products to end users within UAE and the other GCC countries, on behalf of a range of major companies in the industry.
